Developing a miniature underwater robot that can withstand extreme pressure and explore deeper parts of the ocean.
Designing a submersible that can withstand the pressure of the deep sea and is equipped with advanced imaging technology.
Creating a remotely operated vehicle (ROV) that can be controlled from a safe distance and is equipped with cameras, sensors, and manipulator arms.
Developing a bioluminescent device that can be attached to the submersible or ROV to illuminate the dark ocean environment.
Creating a virtual reality experience that allows people to explore the deep sea from the comfort of their own homes.
